title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The highest category is found at July 19 where Number of users in millions is 45.0.
The lowest category is found at July 12 where Number of users in millions is 21.0.
The highest value at July 19 is almost 2.14 times larger than the minimum value of July 12.
The highest value at July 19 is almost 2.14 times larger than the minimum value of July 12.
The difference between the max Month July 19 and min Month July 12 is 24.0.
